title: Arshad Nadeem rejects international offers, pledges loyalty to Pakistan
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 12 (APP):Javelin superstar and Olympic gold medalist Arshad Nadeem on Monday said that he received offers from several countries to play for them, but he remains committed to representing Pakistan despite all the hardships.
Speaking to a private news channel, he said, “I have been offered to represent countries like UAE, UK, Turkey, and Uzbekistan, but I declined. My heart belongs to Pakistan, and I want to play for my country, regardless of the outcome.”
Nadeem also mentioned that while he is currently a brand ambassador in Uzbekistan, he still refused their offer to compete under their flag.
Arshad Nadeem made history by winning a gold medal for Pakistan at the Paris Olympics, marking the country’s first Olympic gold in 40 years.
He expressed deep gratitude to the nation for the overwhelming support and the hero’s welcome he received.
